title: PROJECT: Zed Skin Bug
body:
The texture detail of the PROJECT: Zed skin is not controlled by the character detail setting, but rather by the effect detail setting. Character detail on very high looks the same as character detail on very low. However, increasing the effect detail increases the resolution of Zed's body textures. Not a game breaking bug, but I like to keep effect detail low because certain effects cause a large fps drop. I have tried repairing the client. Please fix.

Mac OS X Yosemite 10.10.5

replies.body: Same happens with Blood Moon Thresh.

Hey yung goblin,

Thanks for the report! We're currently working to resolve an issue where several skins aren't controlled by the proper setting.
